thread.title: UC goes back to the drawing board on controversial revamp of free-speech policy
thread.title_full: UC goes back to the drawing board on controversial revamp of free-speech policy

title: UC goes back to the drawing board on controversial revamp of free-speech policy
text:
18 UC goes back to the drawing board on controversial revamp of free-speech policy 
Los Angeles Times: It's been a half-century since the Free Speech Movement was born on the steps of Sproul Hall at UC Berkeley, inspiring nationwide protests and creating the principle of unfettered expression on campus.On Thursday, UC regents debated a modern-day sequel: how to allow for free speech while protecting students against prejudice.
